alert.note: Alert for Tulare (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 01 at 12:15AM PDT until further notice by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by upstream dam release continues. * WHERE...A portion of central California, including the following counties, Fresno, Kings and Tulare. * WHEN...Until 900 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying areas. River or stream flows are elevated along the King`s River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1214 AM PDT, an upstream floodgate release is expected to continue minor flooding in the advisory area along the King`s River. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sanger, Reedley and Kingsburg. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
